title: [娱乐]Munchausen Fireworks - 异想天开的烟花[1.7.2-1.8.1]
author: 封尼玛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:40 编辑 

从老外那里看到一个插件,觉得挺好玩的,转过来给大家分享一下。

首先呢  ，   是合成工式~

一个烟花+一个栓绳=可载人烟花
这时候的烟花飞大概一秒多就没了。。
那要怎么延时呢？    当然是强化啦~~

一个火药+1s的飞行时间,最高只能50秒。

然后这个好像是,无限使用的火箭,但是时间太短了。。

可以无限使用,但是飞行时间短。
----------------------------------------------------
本插件最后一样物品。。《空气炸弹》
合成方式:  石按钮-打火石-TNT。

-------------------------------------------------------
关于骑上火箭的方法嘛
在疾跑过程中，拿着烟花对地板右键。鼠标控制方向！

命令:
/munchausen help — Mmm..../munchausen give — shows virtual inventory with Munchausen Fireworks (and fuel)/munchausen reload — reload plugin configuration


权限节点:
munchausen.give — allows to use give and help commandsmunchausen.config — allows to use reload commandmunchausen.firework — allows to use Munchausen Fireworksmunchausen.carrier— allows to use Carrier Fireworksmunchausen.firework.launchmob — allows to launch mobs with Munchausen Fireworksmunchausen.firework.launchplayer — allows to launch other playersmunchausen.fireworks.craft — allows to use crafting recipesmunchausen.bomberman — allows to use Air bombs


配置文件:
general:
  check-updates: true # true - to enable update checker
  language: english # language (russian - included)
  language-save: false # save language file
firework:
  sprint-to-fly: true # Need sprinting to fly at firework
  item-craft-enable: true # Use crafting recipes
  decrease-takeoff-speed: true # if set to true the takeoff speed is lower than usual
  munchausen:
    item: '&6Munchausen_Firework$FIREWORK'   # Munchausen Firework item
    maxPower: 50 # Max power of rocket that could be reached using power-up recipe
    take-off-modifier: 0.8  # 1 - normal speed (100%), 0.8 = 80% of normal speed
    item-remove: true  # false - to infinitive fireworks
    randomize-firework: false # Ignore firework settings and every time create a random firework effect
  carrier:
    item: '&cCarrier_Firework$FIREWORK' # Carrier Firework item
    fuel-item: SULPHUR # Carrier fuel item
    take-off-modifier: 0.45   # 1 - normal speed (100%), 0.45 = 45% of normal speed
    base-time: 1.0   # time between reloads 
    explode-effect-on-reload: true # play small explosion effect when carrier is reloading
    need-fuel-to-fly: true # set to false if you need do disable fuel usage
fall-from-firework:
  damage-modifier: 100.0  # Fall-damage modifier (in percents). Set 0 to disable damage; 100 - no change; more than 100 - increased damage
  effects: # List of potion effects. Set "effects: []" to disable effects
  - DAMAGE_RESISTANCE time:3s level:3


右键烟花在动物或者怪物地下可以让他们飞走，
munchausen.firework.launchmob 想让玩家可以用烟花载走怪物似乎要这个权限。
munchausen.firework — 允许使用烟花飞行munchausen.carrier—  允许使用无限烟花
应该没错吧。。   各位可以的话帮忙测试一下~~ 我放几张图~~

被烟花载走的小黑，

牛牛君

女巫婆~~

http://pan.baidu.com/s/1i3IO1Hr
度娘盘地址,不放心的可以到原帖下载哦~
原帖地址:http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/munchausen/
